remarks: A condition implying that two operators are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip2eqi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ip2eqi.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ip2eqi.u $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
phoeqi $p |- ( ( S : Y --> X /\ T : Y --> X ) -> ( A. x e. X A. y e. Y ( x P ( S ` y ) ) = ( x P ( T ` y ) ) <-> S = T ) ) $.
$d P x $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d U x $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
